posts.title: Purple Carrots
posts.content: Everything you know is a lie. Now you can make your salads pop – even if they’re not very tasty – by incorporating some purple carrots into the mix. These stunningly vibrant carrots contain a vibrant purple exterior complimented by a deep orange flesh rich in anti-oxidants and vitamins.

posts.title: iPad Arcade Cabinet
posts.content: Relive your glorious arcade days from the comfort of home with the iPad arcade cabinet. This mini cabinet features a cool retro design and includes everything you need to game like in the old days such as a joystick, two red buttons, and a slot to insert quarters.

posts.title: Hidden Liquor Flask Ice Pack
posts.content: Kick up the fun factor during your next outdoor excursion by sneaking in a drink or four inside the hidden liquor flask ice pack. This seemingly inconspicuous ice pack is actually a stealthy and leak-proof 14 ounce BPA plastic flask that won’t alter the taste of your beverage one bit.

posts.title: App Controlled Automatic Pet Feeder
posts.content: Ensure your furry friend gets fed even if you’re not home by using this app controlled automatic pet feeder. It’s large enough to fit up to 7 pounds of dry food and allows you to program scheduled feedings and perform remote feedings with your smartphone.

posts.title: Hundred Dollar Bills Bean Bag
posts.content: Experience what it’s like to be rich enough to be able to sleep on your money when you lay on the hundred dollar bills bean bag chair. It’s puffy, extremely comfy, and comes designed to look like a fat stack of Benjamins – a must-have for any aspiring baller.

posts.title: Mini Karaoke Microphone
posts.content: Turn almost any location into the perfect karaoke spot by putting on a performance with this mini karaoke microphone. It easily connects to you and lets you to record or sing along while still allowing you to access your phone’s other features.

posts.title: Basketball Hoop Mug
posts.content: Encourage the kids to play with their food by serving up their favorite drink or cereal in the basketball hoop mug. This ceramic mug features a built-in hoop ideal for dunking marshmallows into hot chocolate or toppings into delicious ice cream.

posts.title: Microwaveable Boots
posts.content: Keep your feet nice and toasty on cold days by slipping into these microwavable boots. They’re made from a plush fabric that’s soft to the touch and can either be heated up in the microwave or stuffed inside a freezer so that they can be used as cold packs to treat injuries.

posts.title: Underwater Dogs Photography Book
posts.content: Witness the strange beauty of dogs outside of their natural habitat with the underwater dogs photography book. This entertaining book offers readers the chance to laugh and smile as they see page after page of hilarious dogs swimming and frolicking underwater.

posts.title: Superhero Floating Book Shelf
posts.content: Give your literary collection a little whimsical appeal by placing it on this superhero floating book shelf. The clever design creates the illusion your books are floating as the mighty hero flies underneath them to keep them from falling.

posts.title: Nix Mini Color Sensor
posts.content: The Nix mini color sensor eliminates human error so that you can instantly and accurately get paint and color matches from virtually anything around you. This powerful hand-held tool can scan almost anything as long as the surface is larger than 0.5″ and is solid.

posts.title: Grass iPhone Cover
posts.content: Bring a small piece of Japan’s lush gardens to your home by protecting your smartphone with this grass iPhone cover. The case slips snuggly over your phone and covers it with a bright green surface modeled after the soft grass seen in Tokyo’s Yoyogi park.
